title: UI/UX Designer for B2B SaaS application
job_overview:
**Note: Any direct contact outside the onlinejobs platform (WhatsApp, email, LinkedIn, phone, etc.) will be ignored.**

We are looking for an experienced UI/UX Designer to redesign 5-7 key screens of our existing B2B SaaS order management dashboard. You'll be transforming a data-heavy business application into an intuitive interface that reduces cognitive load and improves workflow efficiency for our business users.

Our application is an order management system with built-in automation that helps businesses manage orders from sales through customer service and logistics. This role requires understanding complex business processes and translating them into clean, user-friendly interfaces.

What You'll Be Doing:
- Redesigning 5 critical dashboard screens to improve user workflow
- Creating intuitive navigation for complex data-heavy interfaces  
- Designing for both desktop and mobile platforms
- Solving UX challenges around order management and business automation tools
- Delivering wireframes, high-fidelity designs, and interactive prototypes

Requirements:
* Experience: Minimum 3+ years designing B2B SaaS applications
* Tools: Expert proficiency in Figma
* UX Skills: Proven ability to understand complex business workflows and create intuitive user journeys for data-heavy applications
* Portfolio: Must include B2B SaaS case studies showing your design process, not just final designs
* Language: Native/Fluent English speaker
* Industry Experience Previous work with order management, CRM, or similar business tools preferred

To Apply, Please Provide:
**Start your proposal with "DESIGN READY" to show you've read the full requirements.**

* Portfolio Examples: 2-3 examples of B2B SaaS app designs you have created, with case studies showing your process
* Process Explanation: Brief description of your approach to designing complex data-heavy interfaces
* Availability Confirm your availability for the next 2-3 weeks
* Relevant Experience: 1-2 sentences about your experience with order management systems or similar business applications

**Note:** Applications without relevant B2B SaaS portfolio examples will not be considered.

Process:
* Initial Interview
* Review of the existing application
* Provide quote estimate for completing the work
